doc.title: HTMLIFrameElement: src property
doc.sidebarHTML:
1. HTMLIFrameElement
  2. Instance properties
    1. allowPaymentRequest Non-standard Deprecated
    2. contentDocument
    3. contentWindow
    4. credentialless Experimental
    5. csp Experimental
    6. featurePolicy Experimental
    7. loading
    8. referrerPolicy
    9. src
    10. srcdoc
  3. Inheritance:
    1. HTMLElement
    2. Element
    3. Node
    4. EventTarget

value.content: The HTMLIFrameElement.src property reflects the HTML referrerpolicy attribute of the <iframe> element defining which referrer is sent when fetching the resource.

value.title: Syntax
value.content:
js

refStr = iframeElt.src
iframeElt.src= refStr

value.title: Example
value.content:
js

const iframe = document.createElement("iframe");
iframe.src = "/";
const body = document.querySelector("body");
body.appendChild(iframe); // Fetch the image using the complete URL as the referrer

value.title: See also
value.content:
• HTMLAnchorElement.src
  • HTMLAreaElement.src
  • HTMLAreaElement.src.

doc.summary:
The HTMLIFrameElement.src

  resource.
